descriptionlist.description:
ayeris, finally ported for Anemone!
Winterboard is buggy, slow and really outdated, maybe Surenix doesn't know that (?), so we decided to port this theme to the newest and powerful theming engine called Anemone, @coolstarorg (main dev of Anemone) already did a "porting" of Ayeris but he said that he'll never update that "dirty hack" (as he said), so we did!
Now applying ayeris is more fast because we used IconBundles-large method built-in in Anemone, and you'll never notice the ⚠️ warning near the theme name in anemone because we fixed the control file of the theme to add Anemome as dependency.
If you notice bugs or stuff that doesn't work contact our team from Cydia by tapping Author>Maintainer from the theme info page.

KNOWN BUGS: Dock has an extra line at the upper side, we'r looking into it.

Enjoy!

Credits:
@Geek_Break and @Sn0wCooder for porting the theme, @DeloExtra for some help with the Calendar icon.
